p: The isolates were selected for morphological characterization using Gram staining. Twelve isolates were Gram negative rods while one isolate was a Gram positive rod (Table 3). Molecular characterization of the endophytic bacteria indicate that they are different bacterial species. The final taxonomic status of 5 selected endophytic bacteria isolates was determined by 16S rRNA gene sequencing. The sequence alignment showed the similarity in a range of 97–99% in BLAST with different strains of Pseudomonas aeruginosa namely; P. aeruginosa CP43328.1, P. aeruginosa CP033432.1, P. aeruginosa LR657304.1, P. aeruginosa CP044006.1 and P. aeruginosa CP032126.1 (Table 3).
